body.name: Spectrum Flower Napkin Holder (Black) - Dispenser & Décor for Kitchen, Dining Room, Outdoor, & Bar Tabletop Storage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 45 mins
features: BEAUTIFUL BLOOMING DESIGN: Inspired by flowers in spring, this design creates a charming atmosphere in your kitchen. The simple yet sophisticated arched design adds dainty, elegant style that accents any kitchen space with organizational excellence.

KEEP NAPKINS WITHIN EASY REACH: Vertical napkin holder makes it easy to grab a napkin when you need to wipe your face, protect your lap from dropped food or soak up a spill. Place on the dining table, kitchen countertop, or breakfast nook.

DOES NOT TIP OR WOBBLE: Sturdy base is designed to prevent tipping, wobbling, or toppling. The steel supports the weight of the napkins and distributes the mass evenly along the base, preventing the napkin holder from falling over.

KITCHEN ESSENTIAL DOUBLES AS DÉCOR: While created to serve a function in your home, this functional addition will add fashion to your home, too. The stylish design looks great in any kitchen, for a fashionable, functional item in your home.
DIMENSIONS & CARE: 7. 5" L X 2. 5" W X 5" H; to clean, wipe down with a damp cloth and towel dry. Wipe down as necessary to prevent dirt buildup.
body.description: Add a simple yet stylish touch to your kitchen or dining room table with the Flower Napkin Holder from Spectrum Diversified. Vertical napkin holder makes it easy to grab a napkin when you need to wipe your face, protect your lap from dropped food or soak up a spill. Place on the dining table, kitchen countertop, or breakfast nook. Sturdy base is designed to prevent tipping, wobbling, or toppling. The steel supports the weight of the napkins and distributes the mass evenly along the base, preventing the napkin holder from falling over. While created to serve a function in your home, this functional addition will add fashion to your home, too. The stylish design looks great in any kitchen, for a fashionable, functional item in your home. Inspired by flowers in spring, this design creates a charming atmosphere in your kitchen. The simple yet sophisticated arched design adds dainty, elegant style that accents any kitchen space with organizational excellence. Designed to vertically organize unruly napkins while keeping them dry and off the table, the elegant floral design will look as stylish on your kitchen table as it would in an upscale restaurant. Made of sturdy steel.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Spectrum Founded in 1985 For over 30 years Spectrum has committed itself to providing consumers innovative storage and organization solutions while offering the one of the best service, quality and value. As one of the leading design and manufacturing firms in the housewares industry, we take great pride in listening to our customers and designing items that meet their needs. Spectrum excels at creating unique products that are trendy, functional and built to last. Spectrum’s knowledgeable and creative in-house product development team proudly designs all products here in the USA.

What we do... Spectrum Diversified Designs creates innovative storage and organization solutions for all rooms of the home. We are your source for kitchen & pantry organization, closet & storage organization, laundry & cleaning organization, bathroom organization, office organization, and beauty & hair care organization. We strive daily to provide the best in service, quality, and value to our customers and consumers. Spectrum delivers top notch home organization products including wire baskets, over-the-door and over-the-cabinet storage, and peg board & wall mount solutions. We also feature garage and basement storage, entryway organization, key racks and mail organizers, magazine racks, wine racks, coasters, and hooks. For the kitchen, we’ve got your organization needs covered with fruit bowls, bread baskets, spice racks, sink organization, banana holders, fruit trees, paper towel holders, napkin holders, mug trees, sugar packet baskets, spoon rests, trivets, and much more! Bathrooms have never looked so good with Spectrum’s bath products and beauty organization. Including hair care organizers, jewelry holders, accessory caddies, nail polish holders, soap dishes, toilet paper holders, and suction organization, Spectrum can solve all of your organization and storage needs.

What we do... Spectrum Diversified Designs creates innovative storage and organization solutions for all rooms of the home. Including hair care organizers, jewelry holders, accessory caddies, nail polish holders, soap dishes, toilet paper holders, and suction organization, Spectrum can solve all of your organization and storage needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Standard paper napkins fit fine
reviews.reviewText: This is classy looking, has a small footprint on my crowded kitchen counter/dining area, and has enough heft to stand up and make it easy to find my napkins. Winner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like design and it's very sturdy as well. Holds a good amount of napkins, too, which I was a little concerned about.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic and perfect!
reviews.reviewText: It’s light weight. Kind of a basic design that goes with anything. Great deal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this produt!
reviews.reviewText: I searched for a long time to find a product that would hold napkins. I wanted something that: 1) did not have open sides for napkins to fall out of, 2) had a simple, but nice design, & 3) didn't take up a ton of space. I have used this product for over 2 years & I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Elegant and simple. The matte black gives a luxurious vibe and the size is perfect. The aeathetics will have others asking where you got it. Weight is sturdy and all pieces mended. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made and doubles as my tablet holder for vertical games 😀
reviews.reviewText: I love the style of this and it's well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Napkin Holder
reviews.reviewText: Looks very modern in black, almost looks like wrought iron. It is high enough that the napkins do not fall over if you use a particular brand. Blends in with some of my kitchen gadgets! No problems yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice holder
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact the napkins don't fall out like in other holders.
I love that the napkins are nicely contained in the holder. It’s a cute style and looks great in any decor. Would buy again.

Arrived quickly, well packaged. Easy to fill and remove paper napkins. Possibly able to fold cloth napkins to fit as well. Black seems to work nicely and it keeps napkins handy. Narrow enough to tuck away when not in use.
Adorei, fica lindo na mesa.cabe os dois tamanhos de guardanapo.Vou comprar outro.
Es de excelente calidad! Para servilleta grande!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This looks great on it on as an ornament and a great holder to.
